title: Mia Chloe
author: Mia Chloe
content: My country people una well done oo since wen I don  de dis forum I de observe threads for other boards I notice say some times people de use offensive words wen Dem de try correct others.But since wen I de go through dis our board I neva see curse of any kind we de always de polite wen we de correct others.so I de create dis thread tay praise and thank una say make una continue to de do am oo as e help motivate newbies Dem to ask important questions for here.

comments.body: Well, I no really get your point but waiting I go talk be say this forum nah free place for any body unless say you take the forum as your birth right say you senior everybody for the forum nai all those offensive words go they worry you anytime you come across them, so no reason any of those offensive words because nah just talk and watin I go talk be say if anybody misbehave people go correct the person no matter your age or reputation for the forum.

comments.body: Quote from: Mia Chloe on September 23, 2023, 01:10:16 PMMy country people una well done oo since wen I don  de dis forum I de observe threads for other boards I notice say some times people de use offensive words wen Dem de try correct others.But since wen I de go through dis our board I neva see curse of any kind we de always de polite wen we de correct others.so I de create dis thread tay praise and thank una say make una continue to de do am oo as e help motivate newbies Dem to ask important questions for here. Honestly you get a point, because the first time I joined this forum I don't even know sey Naija board dey, I just dey waka for other boards with fear, but the day I enter this Naija board I con see sey na my people dey here and una con dey relate with each other like one family again, since then I con start to dey get confidence.

comments.body: Na true u talk, na so e go still be for every local board , but for global board, person wey no belong to you fit hit you hard base on say ihn dey claim one yeye seniority. Na to dey very clear and avoid mistake so that anybody try open eye for you, you gon open teeth for am cause some of them na monitoring spirit them be.  One love for our naija group

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 08:34:17 PM Na to dey very clear and avoid mistake so that anybody try open eye for you, you gon open teeth for am cause some of them na monitoring spirit them be. The forum consist of different people from different diversity, so expecting a polite approach from everyone would be a waste of time. If you find a members word abusive or offensive, as long as you aren't wrong just ignore them. In no time, you will notice that other members will defend you on that same issue so there's nothing to be angry about. Nija board is home for us all, and as long as we maintain peace, we will live as one here on Bitcointalk. Ignore those offensive words and move on it's very simple.

comments.body: In every local board there is differences either in behavior or ways of handling things, although I'm still new here but I have been reading and going through several post about this local board I have seen nothing but understanding togetherness, so I they thank those our oga them for this our local board the way them they take moderate am they give me joy them they always make sure say everybody they follow as others they go.
